summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It records inmate population counts by housing unit and includes a roster noting several inmates on suicide watch. The documents are administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total population of 758 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility.
It shows a total inmate population of 758 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.
An inmate roster lists several inmates with assignment codes for 'SUICIDE' watch, indicating special monitoring.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate counts and assignments.
No specific inmate names are listed in the provided text; only unit codes and counts are visible.
